data.name: TOOLTIP_INCIDENT_INCIDENTNARRATIVECODE
data.value: Please give a brief outline of what happened, what led up to the incident and who was involved. Please record the exact words used (including obscenitites or blasphemy) and do not user jargon. Under Data Protection this record must be accurate, relevant and not excessive. It may be used by our solicitors.

data.name: TOOLTIP_INCIDENT_LINEMANAGERNARRATIVECODE
data.value: Your comments and any other information for the Nominated Manager. Please specify exactly what you did to either manage the incident or did in immediate reponse to the incident. Details should record whether you removed the employee from their normal role for any period of time, identified training needs, applied the IMP (Incident Management Plan), provided EAP (Employment Assistance Programme), consulted Sales Representative, etc.

data.value: Thank you for completing the incident report. You need to email this report to your Line Manager and Nominated Manager for their action.

data.name: INCIDENT_EMAIL_FINDEMAILADDRESS
data.value: Find and select your Line Manager's email address using the search fields below and send an email to the selected address.

data.name: INCIDENT_EMAIL_SENDEMAIL
data.value: If you click on the Send Email button without selecting your Line Manager's Email Address, the email will only go to your Nominated Manager.

data.name: INCIDENT_FILE_ATTACHMENT_SIZE
data.value: The maximum file attachment size is 4MB. Please select a smaller attachment or try to reduce the file size using a zip utility

data.name: TOOLTIP_CONTROLMEASURE_REVIEWPERIOD
data.value: Please enter a value for Review Period

data.name: TOOLTIP_INCIDENT_OTHERINCIDENTLOCATION
data.value: Please enter additional information about the 'Other' location here

data.name: LABEL_INCIDENT_CURRENTOWNERSTAFFCODE
data.value: Tick this box if you want to handle this case

data.name: TOOLTIP_INCIDENT_CURRENTOWNERSTAFFCODE
data.value: Tick to handle this case. Untick to revert to Nominated Manager

data.name: TOOLTIP_STATUSCHANGEDTO
data.value: Please enter a value for Status Changed To

data.name: VAL_INCIDENT_CATEGORY_TYPE_INCONSISTENT
data.value: Incident Category and Incident Type are inconsistent, please re-select

data.name: LABEL_INCIDENT_WITNESSREPORT_COMPLETE
data.value: NOTE: If you witnessed the incident you should complete a WITNESS REPORT form.

data.name: LABEL_INCIDENT_WITNESSREPORT_FORMLOCATION
data.value: This can be found on the UCB site on the Health and Safety webpage. (On the left side panel go to A to Z > U > Unacceptable Customer Behaviour - DWP Guidance > Witness Report Form (right panel))
